mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectBsk Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ BSK_NO , MALL_ID , LANG_CD , BSK_TP_CD , MBR_SECT_CD , MBR_NO , SESION_ID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM BSK WHERE 1 = 1 AND BSK_NO = #{bskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteBsk Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM BSK WHERE 1 = 1 AND BSK_NO = #{bskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
